title: Anneliese Dodds – 2022 Comments on LGBT Rights
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Anneliese Dodds, the Chair of the Labour Party, on Twitter on 19 October 2022.
content:
Labour will:
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

▪️ ban all forms of conversion therapy  
▪️ appoint an envoy to promote LGBT+ rights globally  
▪️ modernise the Gender Recognition Act and protect the Equality Act
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product

Labour leading on LGBT+ rights. The Tories paralysed by chaos.
  *[ISIL]: Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant
  *[SDGs]: Sustainable Development Goals
  *[IMF]: International Monetary Fund
  *[UN]: United Nations
  *[GDP]: Gross Domestic Product
